name: LocalStorage.DictPorts

values.name: make
values.comment: Create a `Ports` object from a message wrapper, usually just one of your Msg options.

name: LocalStorage

types.name: LocalStorage
types.comment: Opaque type. Returned by `make` and `getPorts`. Passed to the other functions.

values.name: clear
values.comment: Return a `Cmd` to clear all JS `localStorage` keys that begin with the `prefix` passed to `make`.

values.name: getItem
values.comment: Return a `Cmd` to fetch the value for the `Key` from `LocalStorage`.

values.name: getPorts
values.comment: Return the `Ports` instance you passed to `make` or `setPorts`.

values.name: make
values.comment:
Make a `LocalStorage` instance.

If `prefix` is not empty (""), will prefix all keys in JS `localStorage` with
`prexix ++ "."`.

values.name: makeRealPorts
values.comment: Create a `Ports` value, using what are usually your real Elm `port`s.
values.type: LocalStorage.SharedTypes.GetItemPort msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.SetItemPort msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.ClearPort msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg

values.name: setItem
values.comment: Return a `Cmd` to set the value for the `Key` to `Value` in `LocalStorage`.
values.type: LocalStorage.LocalStorage msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Key -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Value -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: setPorts
values.comment: Set the internal `Ports` value. Fetch it back with `getPorts`.
values.type: LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg -> LocalStorage.LocalStorage msg -> LocalStorage.LocalStorage msg

name: LocalStorage.SharedTypes

aliases.name: ClearPort
aliases.comment: The required signature of your `localStorage.clear` port.

aliases.name: DictState
aliases.comment: A `Dict` that stores key/value pairs for the simulated ports.

aliases.name: GetItemPort
aliases.comment: The required signature of your `localStorage.getItem` port.

aliases.name: Key
aliases.comment: A convenience type for keys in the store. Same as `String`.

aliases.name: MsgWrapper
aliases.comment:
Your Msg, which wraps the key/value pair from a `getItem` return.

For real ports, you'll only care about the `GetItem` operation. You'll get `Nothing` for the `Ports`.

For simluated ports, you need to store the `Ports` in your `Model`.
aliases.type: LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Operation -> Maybe.Maybe (LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg) -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Key -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Value -> msg

aliases.name: ReceiveItemPort
aliases.comment: The required signature of your subscription to receive `getItem` values.

aliases.name: SetItemPort
aliases.comment: The required signature of your `localStorage.setItem` port.

aliases.name: Value
aliases.comment: A convenience type for values in the store. Same as `Json.Encode.Value`.

types.name: Operation
types.comment:
The operation that caused your wrapper `Msg` to be sent.

For real ports, you'll only ever see GetItemOperation.

For simluated ports, you'll see the others as well, because you have to save the updated state.

types.name: Ports
types.comment:
Wrap up your ports.

You'll usually create one of these with `LocalStorage.realRealPorts` or `DictPorts.make`.

Your update Msg will receive one, if you're using simulated ports.
cases: { getItem : LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.GetItemPort msg , setItem : LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.SetItemPort msg , clear : LocalStorage.SharedTypes.Ports msg -> LocalStorage.SharedTypes.ClearPort msg , state : LocalStorage.SharedTypes.DictState }

values.name: receiveWrapper
values.comment: Use this to turn the Value coming from a receive port into a Msg.
